static FilterByBoundingBox(points, xmin=None, xmax=None, ymin=None, ymax=None, zmin=None, zmax=None)[source]¶

Filtering based on a defined boundary box

:param points :param xmin, xmax: ymin, ymax, zmin, zmax:

Returns: segmented data, segment 0 contains the non-filtered points
Return type: SegmentationProperty
static FilterBySphericalCoordinates(sphCoorProp, minAzimuth=0, maxAzimuth=360, minElevationAngle=-90, maxElevationAngle=90, minRange=0, maxRange=None)[source]¶

Filtering based on spherical coordinates values

static SlopeBasedMorphologicFilter(points, searchRadius, slopeThreshold)[source]¶

Slope Based Morphological Filter

:param points :param searchRadius: search radius in meters :param slopeThreshold: maximum slope angle allowed, given in degrees

Returns: segmented points, with segment 0 contains the terrain points
Return type: SegmentationProperty
static SmoothPointSet_MLS(pointset, radius, polynomial_order, polynomial_fit)[source]¶

Smoothing with pcl’s Moving Least Squares (MLS) for data smoothing and imporved normal estimation

Parameters:
  • pointset (PointSet) – PointSet to smooth
  • radius (float) – radius that is to be used for determining the k-nearest neighbors used for fitting.
  • polynomial_order (int) – Set the order of the polynomial to be fit.
  • polynomial_fit (bool) – Set the surface and normal are approximated using a polynomial, or only via tangent estimation.
Returns:

Warning

NOT WORKING. PCL-PYTHON CANNOT BE IMPORTED. WAS NOT DEBUGGED

static smooth_simple(neighbors_property)[source]¶

Smoothing by replacement of each point with its neighbors average value

Parameters: neighbors_property (NeighborsProperty) – the neighborhood property for averaging
Returns: new smoothed pointset
Return type: PointSet
